snippet: Representative Darrell Issa said that he was willing to postpone a vote on holding Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. in contempt of Congress if more records are turned over in the investigation of a flawed gun-smuggling inquiry.
abstract: Rep Darrell Issa says that he is willing to postpone a vote on holding Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr in contempt of Congress if the Justice Department turns over more records as promised in the investigation of a flawed gun-smuggling inquiry.
lead_paragraph: Representative Darrell Issa said that he was willing to postpone a vote on holding Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. in contempt of Congress if more records are turned over in the investigation of a flawed gun-smuggling inquiry.

headline.main: Issa Says He May Delay Contempt Vote
headline.print_headline: Issa Says He May Delay Contempt Vote
